From the studio that brought you Mommy Milk Bandits comes their "new" game, Kotick's Cashgrab

[h1]Things that make this game awesomesauce[/h1]
[list]
[*]Promised PvE is cancelled and replaced with dumbed down and paid PvE
[*]Blizzard admitted to cancelling PvE before OW2 release and let gamers buy expensive OW2 starter packs thinking 2019 PvE was yet to come
[*]OW2 is released in a half baked state "new" features are reintroduced from OW1 (the reintroduction of the 'On Fire' system most recently)
[*]Paid battlepass is WORSE than the previous loot box system. The paid season pass is grindy and often gives you items for heroes you don't use. The free battlepass offers nothing without grinding 7 days a week for MONTHS at a time to get enough currency to make your first skin purchase
[/list]

[h1]Why you should support this game[/h1]
Blizzard is a husk of it previous self. Between blaming workers for taking strikes against work place harassment and trying to get fair pay, to monetising the fun out of their games to appease their god king Bobby Kotick. The company is constantly bouncing from one controversy to the next with no end in sight

[h1]Takeaway[/h1]
